requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 or over
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 310M
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bit 48kHz WAVE format stereo,
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 or over
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 310M
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bit 48kHz WAVE format stereo,

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz or better (x86-64)
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM

Dive: The Conquest of Silver Eye
CatDog: The Quest for the Golden Hydrant

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: (Integrated): Intel HD Graphics or AMD (formerly ATI) Radeon HD Graphics (Discrete): Nvidia GeForce 9600 GT or AMD Radeon HD 2400
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: (Integrated): Intel HD Graphics or AMD (formerly ATI) Radeon HD Graphics (Discrete): Nvidia GeForce GTX 760 (or greater) or AMD Radeon HD 7600 (or greater)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

requirements_ru.recommended: Pentium II 300, 64 Мб памяти, GeForce 2 и выше
